name: World War I
overview: World War I is a 2D real-time strategy game with the nations that participated in the first World War. The player is the Allied commander and a second player can control the Central Powers. He controls all armed forces, both ground troops and fleet. The game has two gameplay modes. There is the overall strategy on the map of Europe, where the player moves armies and fleets and tactical, and there is micro strategy where the player controls smaller groups of soldiers and fights against enemies on smaller battlefields. Armies have several stats, like morale, ammunition or artillery units.
